DataElement.preferredName: Past Year Liver Biopsy Hospital Storage Occur Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator whether the participant has a liver biopsy in the past year, and was the tissue stored at the hospital.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Past Year Liver Biopsy Hospital Storage Occur
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A period of time consisting of the 12 months before the present._A triangular-shaped organ located under the diaphragm in the right hypochondrium. It is the largest internal organ of the body, weighting up to 2 kg. Metabolism and bile secretion are its main functions. It is composed of cells which have the ability to regenerate._The removal of tissue specimens or fluid from the living body for microscopic examination, performed to establish a diagnosis._An institution that provides medical, surgical, or psychiatric care and treatment for the sick or the injured._The act of safekeeping goods in a depository._Come to pass.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A period of time consisting of the 12 months before the present.:A triangular-shaped organ located under the diaphragm in the right hypochondrium. It is the largest internal organ of the body, weighting up to 2 kg. Metabolism and bile secretion are its main functions. It is composed of cells which have the ability to regenerate.:The removal of tissue specimens or fluid from the living body for microscopic examination, performed to establish a diagnosis.

Concepts.definition: A period of time consisting of the 12 months before the present.

A triangular-shaped organ located under the diaphragm in the right hypochondrium. It is the largest internal organ of the body, weighting up to 2 kg. Metabolism and bile secretion are its main functions. It is composed of cells which have the ability to regenerate.
The removal of tissue specimens or fluid from the living body for microscopic examination, performed to establish a diagnosis.

Property.preferredDefinition: An institution that provides medical, surgical, or psychiatric care and treatment for the sick or the injured.:The act of safekeeping goods in a depository.:Come to pass.

Concepts.definition: An institution that provides medical, surgical, or psychiatric care and treatment for the sick or the injured.
The act of safekeeping goods in a depository.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
